mapper.select: SELECT N.EY_ACCOUNT_NUM as accountNum, N.AMOUNT_CURRENT as amountCurrent, N.AMOUNT_ADJ_CR as crAmountAdj, N.AMOUNT_ADJ_DR as drAmountAdj, N.AMOUNT_AUDIT_LAST as amountAuditLast FROM wp_n N where 1 = 1 and N.STATUS = 'Y' and N.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and N.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT N300.ATTR1 as detailName, N300.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY as beginBalance, N300.DR_AMOUNT_CNY as drAmount, N300.CR_AMOUNT_CNY as crAmount FROM wp_n300 N300 where 1 = 1 and N300.STATUS = 'Y' and N300.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and N300.PERIOD = #{period}
